org.apache.mesos.scheduler.recovery.constrain

Interface LaunchConstrainer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllLaunchConstrainer, TestingLaunchConstrainer, TimedLaunchConstrainer, UnconstrainedLaunchConstrainer

    public interface LaunchConstrainer
    This interface provides methods which govern and react to Launch Operations. It is sometimes desirable to limit the rate of Launch Operations. In particular may be desirable to limit the rate of Operations which may be destructive in reaction to permanent failures. Notifications regarding launch Operations and desired RecoveryRequirements allow LaunchConstrainers to throttle Launch Operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canLaunch(RecoveryRequirement offerRequirement)
      Determines whether the given OfferRequirement can be launchHappened right now.
      void launchHappened(Operation launchOperation, RecoveryRequirement.RecoveryType recoveryType)
      Invoked every time a task is launchHappened.

    • Method Detail

      • launchHappened

        void launchHappened(Operation launchOperation,
                    RecoveryRequirement.RecoveryType recoveryType)
        Invoked every time a task is launchHappened.

        We take a Operation so that frameworks can specify additional metadata, in order to smooth the launch rate.

        Parameters:
        launchOperation - The Launch Operation which occurred.
        recoveryType - The type of the recovery which has been executed.

      • canLaunch

        boolean canLaunch(RecoveryRequirement offerRequirement)
        Determines whether the given OfferRequirement can be launchHappened right now.
        Parameters:
        offerRequirement -
        Returns:
        True if the offer is safe to launch immediately, false if it should wait
